title: David Tennant's deleted scenes as Crowley in "Good Omens"
author: Just Tennant
comment: Idk why but the "ALL SURFACES TO BE COVERED IN RATS" is hilarious to me

Scenes like this really show how talented those actors are. Speaking to an empty room whilest pretending to have a conversation with rats and being accidentally sexist towards them? Incredible. I freaking love David Tennant.
So that's how he brought down every phone line in London and pissed off millions of people all in one day.
I know everybody says this about every deleted scene but they really should have kept this scenes. We don't really get any examples of any of Crowley's demonic work in action. Just PowerPoints.

Seeing Crowley in an elevator

Brain: ELEVUHN!
description: David Tennant's two deleted scenes from "Good Omens" (2019) where he is credited as the demon Crowley. Subtitles have been added.
